TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VNSequenceRequestHandler extends Foundation.NSObject

Docs.summary: Coordinates the vision requests of a sequence of images (such as a video stream).

remarks.para: The is the top-level object for multiple-image vision processing ( see for single). Developers instantiate a object with an image and image-processing options. Developers call with an array containing one or more objects (for instance, a ). The of the is called once for each detected object.
